mapper.insert: INSERT INTO usership(self_nickname, friend_nickname, ship_type) VALUES ( #{selfName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{friendName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{shipType,jdbcType=INTEGER} )
mapper.select: SELECT s.usership_id, s.friend_nickname, u.user_photo, u.cook_count, s.create_time FROM (SELECT * FROM usership WHERE self_nickname = #{selfName} AND ship_type = 1 AND ship_status = 1) s LEFT JOIN USER u ON s.friend_nickname = u.user_nickname
